KWayConstrMgr3.hpp

00001 #ifndef KWAY_CONSTRAINT_MGR3_HPP
00002 #define KWAY_CONSTRAINT_MGR3_HPP
00003 
00004 #include "KWayConstrMgrBase.hpp"
00005 #include <FMMoveInfo.hpp>
00006 
00016 class KWayConstrMgr3 : public KWayConstrMgrBase
00017 {
00018 public:
00020   KWayConstrMgr3(unsigned int numParts) : KWayConstrMgrBase(numParts) {}  
00021 
00028   bool satisfied(const Cell& cell, 
00029                  unsigned int fromPart, 
00030                  unsigned int toPart)
00031   {
00032     const int weight = cell.getWeight();
00033     const int diffToOld = _diff[toPart];
00034     const int diffTo = diffToOld + weight;
00035     const int diffFromOld = _diff[fromPart];
00036     const int diffFrom = diffFromOld - weight;
00037     /* If the move is decreasing the difference, it is satisfied */
00038     if (abs(diffFrom - diffTo) < abs(diffFromOld - diffToOld)) return true;
00039     /* Otherwise, if the move is not within the bounds, it is not satisfied. */
00040     if (_lowerBound > diffFrom || diffTo > _upperBound) return false; 
00041     /* Moreover, if the overall is not satisfied at all, the move is
00042        also considered as unsatisfied. */   
00043     if (!satisfiedAll()) return false;
00044     return true;
00045   }
00046 };
00047 
00050 #endif
